resources.string: FoodVille is a new Online Food Ordering and Delivery Service launched in 2018 to deliver your cravings at your doorsteps. We are passionate about food and are always prompt to whenever the radar blips hungry. Come rain, heat and storm our delivery team will be at your doorsteps with a bright smile and holding the food you have been craving, intact through our insulated boxes!

We just don't want you hungry!
 A hungry man is a angry man.
 FoodVille gives you another reason to be stress-free in life. We don't want you to sweat in the kitchen to waste your valuable passtime after a long week of work.
 So here we are , helping you to find the best food available in Sylhet city.Every order will be delivered 60 minutes after the order is taken.

Your Order is confirmed.It will be delivered within an hour.
 For any kind of problem feel free to call us.
 Thank you for choosing FoodVille.
